title: AutoFill
body: Right I'm a completely disappointed in riot right now. Like what are you guys trying to fucking do? Did yous want Ranked to be like normal's? but with the Auto fill there is no point in selecting 2 fucking roles because your never gonna get the one you select. Normal Game are toxic enough we don't need this shit in ranked Fix it or you are going to start losing players to dota 2. Its beyond a joke right now what were you guys thinking by putting it in ? to reduce queue times? Well that didn't work at all so time to Take it off and try a different method. so many dumb ideas and so many broken champs doesn't even look or feel like you care about the people that plays YOUR GAME.

replies.body:
People often forget that you can trade roles in champion select. Even if it gives you a random role, you can talk to other players and maybe swap for one of your main roles. In theory it's just like the old champion select.

Only [0.06% of players in Bronze get autofill](https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2016/june/DQU/graph-autofilling.jpg?v=1), so it shouldn't be a very common occurrence for you anyway.

^ What this guy/girl said. 

I have to deal with autofill in every game. You still get your role like 80% of the time, so it doesn't bother me.

I have yet to do ranked on this account but I know I'm bronze 5. But autofill sounds fun even though that generally, fill = support. I don't even mind support since it's my main role but I can fill. I feel autofill isn't going to fix queue times because most people have a specific role but having people pick that option is still ok.
I don't see how autofill is an improvement over the people that pick sup/fill already though.
Nope It goes throught all ranks im in bronze and i have to fucking do it.
